name: ZOMBIE ARENA SURVIVAL
description:
ZOMBIE ARENA SURVIVAL

Kill as many zombies as you can before they kill you.
ZOMBIE ARENA SURVIVAL is a top down shooter where you fight zombies either in melee or ranged combat and try to survive as long as possible before they kill you.

Originally just a prototype for a combat system, I decided to make a little game out of it, which I hope will give a few people some fun.

Supports mouse and keyboard only
